# transform struct

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/spatialmath/transform
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:27:53.960311

---

A combination of scale, rotation, and translation, applied in that order.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/SpatialMath }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Scale` | `vector3` | The scale of this `transform`. |
| `Rotation` | `rotation` | The rotation of this `transform`. |
| `Translation` | `vector3` | The location of this `transform`. |
